description: This table contains a list of all of the cardiovascular findings associated with the result for this order.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: ORD_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CV_FINDINGS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:

May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CV_FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the study findings associated with this contact.

columns.name: ORD_END_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the end date for each order in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date the order was placed. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple orders on one day.
